description: Nginx access log analytics dashboard using Promtail and Loki v2+. Prometheus datasource is created from Loki service.

targets.expr: count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [1h])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [24h])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [2d])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [7d])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri = `/favicon.ico` | __error__=`` [7d])))

sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [1d])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [1d])))

topk(10, sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | __error__=`` [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by(http_referer) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | http_referer !~ `$bot_http_referer_regex` | remote_addr != `127.0.0.1` | __error__=`` [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by(request_uri) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | __error__=`` [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent =~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | __error__=`` [$__interval])))
topk(5, sum by(http_referer) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `$bot_user_agent_regex` | http_referer !~ `.*varso.org.*` | __error__=`` [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by(http_user_agent) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | __error__=`` [$__interval])))
sum by(status) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | __error__=`` [$__interval]))
sum by(host) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} [$__interval]))
sum(rate({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | status >= 500 | __error__=`` [$__interval])) / sum(rate({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | __error__=`` [$__interval])) / 100
sum(rate({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} |= `Googlebot` [$__interval])) / sum(rate({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} != `Googlebot` [$__interval])) / 100
sum by(host) (sum_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | status = `200` | unwrap body_bytes_sent | __error__=`` [$__interval]))
{container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | line_format `request for {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} from {{.remote_addr}} located {{.geoip_country_code}}`
quantile_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$__interval])
max by(host) (max_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1", container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | unwrap request_time | __error__=`` [$__interval]))
sum by(status) (count_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | __error__=`` [$__interval]))
sum by(host) (sum_over_time({container="varsoapi-nginx-1"} | json | status = `200` | unwrap body_bytes_sent | __error__=`` [$__interval]))

title: Web Analytics
